snippet: PARNES--Howard L. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and longtime friend, Howard Parnes, and send condolences to his family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PARNES--Howard L. The members of The Lotos Club mourn the loss of their distinguished colleague and longtime friend, Howard Parnes, and send condolences to his family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PARNES, HOWARD L
